title: Is hologram technology the future of mobile phones? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. There are various holographic technologies that may take hold for next phones. Most likely augmented reality glasses with mobile phone chips in them or linked to mobile phones will be one of the next big steps. Such products exist but in a generation (or two) we might have many people interacting with glasses rather than phones in hand. interactions will be via speech, eyes, and hands.
